fields.name: NOTICE_DATE
fields.doc: date and time of notice creation

fields.name: TRIGGER_NUM
fields.doc: string of alpha and digits uniquely identifying event

fields.name: SEG_NUM
fields.doc: Swift serial number (for Swift notice types only)

fields.name: SRC_RA
fields.doc: RA of the XRT bore sight OR RA of the pointing direction of the s/c ?? in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: SRC_DEC
fields.doc: Dec of the XRT bore sight OR Dec of the pointing direction of the s/c ?? in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: SPER_START_DATE
fields.doc: Truncated Julian Day of the Swift-BAT transient trigger start date [TJD]

fields.name: SPER_START_TIME
fields.doc: UT seconds-of-day of the Swift-BAT transient trigger start time [SOD]

fields.name: SPER_STOP_DATE
fields.doc: Truncated Julian Day of the Swift-BAT transient trigger stop date [TJD]

fields.name: SPER_STOP_TIME
fields.doc: UT seconds-of-day of the Swift-BAT transient trigger stop time [SOD]

fields.name: TOT_EXPO_TIME
fields.doc: exposure time duration of the spectrum integration [sec]

fields.name: N_PKTS
fields.doc: Number of pkts in the integration

fields.name: N_EVTS
fields.doc: Number of events in the integration

fields.name: SPER_URL
fields.doc: full URL of Swift XRT Single-Pixel-Event-Report

fields.name: MISC_19
fields.doc: 32 Flag Bits. See https://gcn.gsfc.nasa.gov/sock_pkt_def_doc.html for definition of bits, some bits may not be defined
